name: infinite-continue-stop-hook
description: Automated hook system for continuous task execution in Claude Code

scripts.test: npm run fix-contamination && node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/jest && npm run fix-contamination
scripts.test:coverage: npm run fix-contamination && node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/jest --coverage && npm run fix-contamination
scripts.test:protected: node scripts/jest-contamination-fix.js & JEST_PID=$! && node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/jest && kill $JEST_PID 2>/dev/null || true && npm run fix-contamination
scripts.test:safe: npm run fix-contamination && node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/jest --config jest.contamination-safe.config.js && npm run fix-contamination
scripts.build: npm run validate-build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run post-build-validate
scripts.build:safe: npm run validate-build && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run post-build-validate
scripts.build:enhanced: node scripts/robust-build.js --command 'npm run validate-build && npm run lint && npm run test:safe && npm run post-build-validate'
scripts.build:production: node scripts/robust-build.js --command 'npm run validate-build && npm run lint && echo "Tests skipped for production build" && npm run post-build-validate'
scripts.post-build-validate: npm run fix-contamination && npm run validate-build
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run fix-contamination

author: Claude Code Hook System
